CustomField.description: Verifies if today is between start and end of blackout period for open fund lineup changes. Related Flow uses this checkbox daily to change fund lineup status to "In Blackout"
CustomField.formula: Blackout_Start_Date__c <= TODAY() && Blackout_End_Date__c > TODAY() && NOT( ISPICKVAL( Fund_Lineup_Change_Status__c , "Completed"))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Verifies if today is between start and end of blackout period for open fund lineup changes. Related Flow uses this checkbox daily to change fund lineup status to "In Blackout"
CustomField.label: In Blackout
